data.eml:eml: Four new species of the subfamily Psilodercinae (Araneae: Ochyroceratidae) from Southwest China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Chunxia, Li, Shuqiang (2013): Four new species of the subfamily Psilodercinae (Araneae: Ochyroceratidae) from Southwest China. Zootaxa 3718 (1): 39-57, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.1.3
